#summary Create the WSExplorer Jar

= Create the WSExplorer Jar =

If you want to make the runnable jar, follow these steps:
 # Run Eclipse 3.4 or higher
 # Checkout the project
 # Right-click on the project
 # Choose Export, Java, Runnable Jar
 # Choose the proper run configuration (you may need to run the WSExplorer.java as a Java Application first).
 # Choose the appropriate location to store the jar
 # Choose Package required libraries into generated jar
 # Choose Finish!
